name: LiquidityController
description: Adds permanent liquidity to DRC/ETH pool.

functionDecorators.name: addLiquidity
functionDecorators.description: Transfers specified amount of WETH from caller and uses half to buy DRC. The DRC and remaining WETH are permanently added to liquidity pool.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: the amount of WETH to transfer from caller.
